pages.text:
Boutique Pet Care Facility in Winter Park, FL
Support Local, Choose Winter Park Paws!
Since 2018, Winter Park Paws has been proudly locally owned and operated—not a franchise, not corporate, just a genuine small business with deep roots in our community. We grew up here in Winter Park, attending local schools and working and volunteering in our communities while embracing everything that makes our hometown special.
When you choose Winter Park Paws, you're not just picking a dog daycare and boarding facility run by an investor or hedge fund—you're supporting your neighbors, investing in your community, and helping a local business thrive. We're on a mission to give back because Winter Park is more than where we work—it's home. As a minority-owned, women-led business, we feel it is important for you to know what a difference you are making in our lives.
Thank YOU for actively choosing us for your pet's
Alicia, Owner of WPP, founded Winter Park Paws Dog Daycare & Suites℠ after identifying a need for boutique high-quality facility-based pet care while building her private dog walking business. She launched Winter Park Paws Dog Daycare & Suites, focusing on small group home-like care within a facility.
Natives of Winter Park, Alicia, and Chelsey have over 20 combined years of pet care experience and aimed to establish a women-led minority business within their community. In 2018, Alicia moved on from corporate marketing to pursue her dream in pet care, culminating in opening her daycare and boarding facility in Winter Park during the pandemic.
Supported by her Co-founder, Chelsey, and the community, they have served thousands of customers, dedicating their lives to providing personalized, high-quality care for every canine that comes their way.
Winter Park Paws provides a nurturing, holistic, and stimulating environment, ensuring pets receive the same detailed care they do at home. The facility prioritizes compassion, safety, and reliability, guided by professionalism and cleanliness. Alicia and Chelsey are committed to their community and pets, which drives their passion for high-quality pet care.
Alicia Valdes-Pages, Owner & Founder
Chelsey Rodriguez, Co-Founder

Winter Park Paws Dog Daycare & Suites℠
A Boutique Enrichment Dog Boarding Provider
Winter Park Paws Dog Daycare & Suites℠ is a boutique enrichment dog daycare and boarding pet care provider in Winter Park with limited capacity as we focus on quality care rather than quantity. Premium Canine Care and Exceptional Customer Service are at the heart of everything we do. At Winter Park Paws Dog Daycare & Suites℠, we prioritize the well-being and happiness of your beloved pets while ensuring that every interaction with our clients is pleasant and fulfilling. We are committed to offering canines and their owners a high-quality and enriching experience. Discover Winter Park's premier boutique dog daycare and boarding facility for quality pet care. Book now for a high-quality, enriching experience!
Discover an elevated pet care experience and see how a genuinely comprehensive service can enhance the life of you and your beloved pet.
At Winter Park Paws, we prioritize quality over quantity when caring for pets. Our intimate overnight dog boarding offers a calm, low-stress environment for a cozy experience. If you are looking for a professional, small, home-like boarding option for your dog, you’ve found the right place!
“Sushi, our French Bulldog fur baby has an absolute BLAST while attending Doggy Daycare or Boarding at WINTER PARK PAWS. The staff is super excited to see their fur clients upon arrival-you can tell they adore the animals, they are extremely professional and welcoming. The facility always smells fresh and clean, which we really appreciate knowing that Sushi has a safe/clean space to play. Having the shaded astro turf outdoors ensures that Sushi doesn’t have any allergy exposure to regular grass/pesticides. We love that our family gets daily updates/photos and notifications of our pups active day. We have personally recommended Winter Park Paws to many friends and family!” -Melissa M.
Join us for an unforgettable enrichment experience where every wag is celebrated, and your pet's well-being is our top priority.
END .sqs-gallery-meta-container
Get Started
Winter Park Paws Is A PackPro Certified Facility
We are committed to maintaining a safe and balanced environment
At Winter Park Paws, we focus on helping our team create safe, fun, and effective playgroups for dog daycare and boarding. Our staff is trained to manage groups of dogs safely and enjoyably. Everyone understands how to lead playgroups and receive the same training to ensure consistent care for our guests. PackPro training has proven to
reduce
problem behaviors such as zooming, gate crashing, injuries, and incessant barking while
increasing
employee satisfaction, confidence, and skill. We are skilled on dog body language and canine communication.
Peace Of Mind Philosophy
At Winter Park Paws Dog Daycare & Suites℠, the safety and well-being of your pets are our top priorities. We want to assure you that our staff is certified in pet first aid and CPR, ensuring that we are prepared to manage emergencies should they arise. Additionally, we are a
licensed, bonded, and insured
facility, complying with all county regulations. This commitment to safety and professionalism guarantees a secure environment for your furry friends while they enjoy playtime, socialization, and enrichment activities at our dog daycare and boarding facility. You can have peace of mind knowing your pets are in capable and caring hands.
Dog Boarding Suite Features
Give your pet a better pet boarding experience at in Winter Park with our comfy, spacious dog suites. Each suite features cozy bedding and personal attention from trained staff. Your dog will enjoy engaging in activities while we prioritize safety with regular cleaning and 24/7 supervision. Our boarding includes supervised playtime for socialization for eligible pets or one-on-one care. Choose us for a family-like experience where your pet will be cared for like family.
suite features
Custom built, secure and safe private rooms.
Commercial grade build with FRP walls and non-slip vinyl flooring that are easy to clean, sanitize and disinfect.
Various size suites for different dogs. Room sizes are: 3x5, 4x6, and 6x7. Accommodations are available for small to XL Breed. We assign all rooms at check-in according to the dog size, needs, and household.
Secured privacy door to prevent escape. Some suites have a complete privacy door for anxious dogs prone to jumping; others offer a half door (4ft high) for non-jumpers to give an open-air feel.
Full privacy in non-shared rooms, ensuring your pet's comfort and stress-free stay.
Stress-free, cozy suite experience.
Sound dampening panels throughout.
Dimmed hallway night light.
Soft, soothing music while they sleep.
Luxury Kurunda cot - indestructible aluminum hypoallergenic elevated orthopedic cot that supports your pet’s joints by alleviating pressure points on the hips, elbows, and shoulders.
Optimal air circulation, climate-controlled AC 24/7.
Five-stage medical-grade H13 HEPA filters feature advanced germicidal UVC technology throughout.
Stainless steel food and water bowls provided, including slow feeders.
24/7 video monitoring by staff.
“My husband and I have 3 dogs and have moved around a lot as a young couple. With that said, we have tried so many different dog daycares and boarding establishments in the past. But none have come close to giving us the comfort, professionalism and peace of mind as Winter Park Paws. We’ve been consistent weekly customers of Winter Park paws for the past 6 months. In that time, Winter Park Paws has watched and cared for our 3 dogs in the best way. We even took a few vacations and tried their boarding service as well. Winter Park Paws gave us daily updates for both daycare and boarding. Winter Park Paws took many photos of our pups and are very active on their Instagram which was great to discover! We could always check on our dogs and see how they were doing. They always have the biggest smiles on their faces when they are in the care of Winter Park Paws. You can tell all the employees are well trained and they’ve all loved our dogs fully & work very hard to give the best service possible. We were also happy to find out there was an onboarding evaluation before being able to be clients in their facility. Winter Park Paws cares that all the dogs that interact are in a safe and positive environment. Winter Park Paws cares about the well being of their client’s animals above all else. We wouldn’t hesitate to recommend their services to anyone looking for the best care for their pets, you won’t regret it! We just want to give a personal thank you to all the staff. Kubo, Cloud and Boo will miss you all so much and so will we. We wish we could take you with us on our move to our new chapter! We hope this review will help shine a true light on how amazing you all have been. Thank you again!” -The Oroks
Get Started
Elevate your pet care journey and discover the difference a truly comprehensive service can make for you and your cherished companion!
See what is included in your pets stay
Playgroup participation throughout the day if eligible. See

Daily and weekly special activities and seasonal crafts
Indestructible aluminum hypoallergenic elevated orthopedic cot
Personal care routines such as daily wipe downs of face, paws, and rear ends
At Winter Park Paws, we understand the importance of staying connected with your furry friend. That's why we provide
daily reports with photos
sent via text and email at day's end, detailing their activities, enjoyment, issues, concerns, and any recommendations. This regular communication ensures you're always in the loop about your dog's daycare experience.
Custom feeding regime with meals planned and provided by you. Kibble, canned, fresh, or raw food diets are accepted. We will administer their food as you do at home! Breakfast, lunch, and dinner.
Medication and Supplement Administration, except diabetic injections.
With interactive play sessions tailored to their personalities, every moment spent with us is infused with love and attention. We also provide regular updates and photos so you can feel connected and reassured, knowing your beloved companion is enjoying their time to the fullest. At Winter Park Paws, we are committed to delivering a distinctive pet boarding experience that addresses your pet's essential needs and specific preferences, all included in our standard service. We focus on giving every pet equal attention in a secure, clean environment. We prioritize individualized care, ensuring each dog receives the affection and attention they deserves without any unexpected charges. Your pet’s happiness and well-being are our top priorities, and we guarantee they will receive the personalized care they need.
Requirements To Attend
END .sqs-gallery-meta-container
Imagine a pet care experience that goes beyond the ordinary—a delightful journey tailored to your furry friends' needs and your peace of mind. Picture a world where every aspect of pet care is meticulously crafted to ensure happiness and health.
Winter Park Paws is a locally owned, operated, and women-lead dog hotel boutique focused on offering personalized care for pets and their owners in a safe and transparent setting.
Get Started
“If you’re looking for an outstanding doggy daycare, WPP facility is the place to be! WPP facility’s offers exceptional care and comfort, especially for high-energy dogs like mine. My pup eagerly anticipates his weekly visits when I go to work and is always thrilled to stay for boarding when we go on trips. It’s incredibly reassuring to know he’s not just being looked after, but truly thriving in a fun and friendly environment. My husband and I feel the love and attention Alicia and Chelsey provide to all of the pups that go to their facility. They consistently add fun activities throughout the month, making it even more exciting to drop him off. Their flexibility and commitment to providing the best care give me complete peace of mind. This facility provides unparalleled service for our pets. I can’t recommend it highly enough—truly an outstanding experience for both pets and their owners. Thank you Alicia and Chelsey for making Poncho so happy!”
Quality Commitment To You
At Winter Park Paws, we understand the importance of a safe and healthy environment for your pets. Our primary focus is minimizing the presence of bacteria and viruses to ensure the well-being of all our staff and furry clients. To achieve this, we implement a rigorous daily cleaning regimen using vet-approved, pet-safe products. Furthermore, our facility boasts modern medical-grade H13 HEPA filters and Germicidal UVC technology. This advanced air purification not only enhances the cleanliness of our environment but also meets the highest safety standards for your pets. We are dedicated to maintaining this commitment to quality, as it reflects our deep appreciation for the trust you place in us. Your pet's health and safety are our utmost priorities, and we continuously strive to exceed your expectations.
Security
At Winter Park Paws Dog Daycare & Suites℠, the safety and security of your pet is our utmost priority. Our facility lobby is locked 24/7, ensuring only authorized individuals, such as pet parents and our dedicated staff, can enter. We implement stringent security measures to maintain a safe environment. Our facility is monitored around the clock with advanced innovative security systems, including indoor and outdoor cameras and sensors. In the event of an emergency, we have an auto emergency dispatch protocol that directly notifies fire, police, and our management team. The Fire department is less than half a mile from our facility, and management is located right off-site within walking distance. Additionally, our security system features auto arming capabilities, smoke and carbon monoxide detection, and glass break protection. These features work together to provide you and your beloved pets with comprehensive safety and peace of mind.
Qualified
At Winter Park Paws, your pet's safety and comfort are our top priorities. We maintain a secure environment where dogs can thrive, engaging in enriching activities designed to promote socialization and mental stimulation. Our small group daycare model ensures each dog receives personalized attention from our trained staff, allowing for tailored care that meets their individual needs. We implement strict safety protocols and monitor all playgroups closely to facilitate safe interactions. Whether your dog is with us for a few hours or an extended stay, you can rest easy knowing they are cared for by experienced professionals who treat each pet as part of our family. Our commitment is to ensure that every dog enjoys a happy, healthy experience while you're away. Trust Winter Park Paws to provide the attentive care your pet deserves.
Get Started
DAYCARE
PRICING
From engaging daily activities that stimulate your dogs mind and body to personalized nutrition plans that cater to their unique dietary requirements, we offer a holistic approach that nurtures both pets and their owners.

Winter Park Paws Dog Daycare & Suites℠
Preparing For Your Pets Boarding Stay
A maximum of 3 personal pet items per pet are allowed during their stay. Excess items will be denied at check-in. All personal pet items must be in good condition (not broken, torn, or dirty) and cleaned. All items brought into the facility must be free of bugs/pests, excess pet hair, urine, throw-up, or feces. Items that we deem unfit will be returned at check-in. We are not responsible for damaged or lost pet items.
Provided By US
Bed:
We provide hypoallergenic commercial-grade large orthopedic pet cots that hold up to 175 lbs. and fits an XL breed.
Food & Water Bowls
: We provide stainless steel food and water bowls. Please do not bring any of your pet’s bowls/stands. We offer slow feeders to guests upon request.
Water:
Filtered or tap.
On occasion we will provide a blanket if dog is deemed safe with items (isn’t destructive).
We can feed your pet our in-house food for a $5 fee per meal.
You Can Bring
Toys:
Bring indestructible, appropriately sized, and digestible toys.
Bedding:
One cot topper, a small to medium plush dog bed, or a small to medium blanket for the provided cot. All items must be labeled with your pet’s full name in permanent marker.*
Pet Meds/Supplements:
Bring medications or supplements in their original packaging with labels. They must be non-expired and in their original container. Write your pet’s name and instructions on the meds with a permanent marker, and include a note in a resealable bag.
*We do not provide blankets or plush bedding. Without an onsite washer, we will clean soiled items as best as possible, but we cannot guarantee their return or condition.
Prohibited Items
Indigestible, soft rubber, fluff, squeaker toys and rawhide chews.
Pet cots, comforters, large blankets, or pillows.
Any items we deem unfit for their stay will be denied at check-in.
Food Packaging Instructions
To avoid underfeeding, overfeeding, or feeding incorrectly, it's crucial to adhere to these guidelines. Please note that original pet food bags, containers, and scoopers are not allowed due to limited storage. Failure to pack your pet's food correctly according to our instructions may result in a $ 25 charge, as we will need to repack it by meal. We do have a refrigerator and freezer for pet food, medications, and supplements.
Dry or Homemade Food:
For your convenience, meals should be in resealable silicon or plastic bags. Bag each meal separately (e.g., Bag 1- AM: 1 cup, Bag 2- PM: 1 cup). Write your pet’s first and last name on the bag, label each meal (Breakfast, lunch, dinner), and any special instructions (e.g., add water, mix with wet food).
Canned Food:
It's important to label the cans with your pet’s first and last name, serving instructions, and any special instructions. This shows your responsibility and care for your pet.
Prepackaged Raw/Fresh Food:
Keep raw/fresh food (Farmers Dog, Ollie, etc.) in original packaging or resealable bags. Freeze all raw food except what is needed on check-in day. We will thaw as needed. Leave a note of special instructions (e.g., heat, add water).
Treats:
Pack treats, dental chews, and chews in resealable bags, with enough for the entire stay (e.g., 6 dental chews for 6 days). Remember, only provide digestible treats; no rawhide for safety.
Extra Food:
Include an extra day’s worth of food for unexpected delays or spills. Rest assured, any unused food will be returned, so you can feel secure and not wasteful. If extra food is not packed and your pet runs our or the food spills, we will feed out in-house food at a fee.
Examples How to Pack Pet Food, Supplements and Medication
